name: Gene Expression Omnibus
description: Public functional genemics database.

name: Single Cell PORTAL
description: Public database for single cell RNA.

name: Single Cell Expression Atlas
description: Public database for single cell RNA.

name: PubChem
description: One of the biggest chemical database such as compounds, genes and proteins.

name: ChEBI
description: Chemical database  focused on small chemical compounds.

name: ChEMBL
description: Database of bioactive molecules with drug-like properties.

name: ChemSpider
description: Chemical structure database.

name: KEGG COMPOUND
description: Collection of small molecules and biopolymers.

name: LIPID MAPS
description: Database of lipids.

name: Rhea
description: Database of chemical reactions.

name: PathwayCommons
description: Database of Pathways and Interactions.

name: KEGG PATHWAY
description: Collection fo drawn pathway maps.

name: WikiPathways
description: Database of biological pathways.

name: MassBank
description: Open souce databases and tools for mass spectrometry reference spectra.

name: MoNA MassBank of North America
description: Meta database of metabolite mass spectra, metadata and associated compounds.

name: THE HUMAN PROTEIN ATLAS
description: One of the biggest human protein database contained cells, tissues, and organs.

name: PROTEIN DATA BANK
description: Database of the 3D shapes of proteins, nucleic acids, and complex assemblies.

name: UniProt
description: The collection of functional information on proteins.

name: Human Genome Resources at NCBI
description: Database of image, proteomics, transcriptomics and systems biology.

name: GenBank
description: Database of genetic sequence offered by NCBI.

name: UCSC Genome Browser
description: Genome blowser offered by UCSC.

name: cBioPortal
description: Database of Cancer Genomics. This has overall metaview for a lot of patients.

name: KEGG DRUG
description: Comprehensive drug information resource for approved drugs.

name: DrugBank
description: A database of drug and target maintained by the University of Alberta.

name: DGIdb
description: A database of drug-gene interactions and the druggable genome.

name: DGIdb
description: A database of drug-gene interactions and the druggable genome.

name: Comparative Toxicogenomics Database
description: A database of Chemical-gene interactions, Chemical-disease associations, Gene-disease associations, and Chemical-phenotype associations.

name: SNAP
description: A dataset which contains Drug-gene interactions.

name: Comparative Toxicogenomics Database
description: A database for drug-target interactions.

name: Therapeutics Data Commons
description: A database for a lot of tasks such as drug-target, drug-response, drug-drug interaction.

name: NCI60
description: A database of drug sensitibity which has 1000 human cancer cell lines and 100s compounds.

name: Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC)
description: A database of drug sensitibity which has 1000 human cancer cell lines and 100s compounds.

name: Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia
description: A database of cancer cell lines. This has 1000 cell lines.

name: STITCH
description: A database of Chemical Protein Interaction.

name: STITCH
description: A database of Chemical Protein Interaction.

name: BindingDB
description: A database of compounds and targes.

name: Chemistry Development Kit
description: A software of cheminformatics and Machine Learning.

description: A software of cheminformatics and Machine Learning.

name: Scanpy
description: scRNA analysis library in Python.

name: Seurat
description: scRNA analysis library in R.

name: DeepPurpose
description: A DL Library for Drug Repurposing and so on.

name: DRKG
description: A library for biological knowledge graph.

name: NeoDTI

name: MCPINN
